```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)

library(ggplot2)

library(tidyverse)
library(gganimate)

```

```{r}

country_data <- read_csv("owid-co2-data.csv",
                         col_types = cols(
                           .default = col_double(),
                           iso_code = col_character(),
                           country = col_character()
                         )) %>%
  drop_na(iso_code) %>%
  filter(year >= 1990,
         country != "World")

write_rds(country_data, "country_data.rds")

```
